dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3840 IH: EO 14253 Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14253 (relating to restoring truth and sanity to American history).

section.text: This Act may be cited as the EO 14253 Act of 2025.
Executive Order 14253 (90 Fed. Reg. 14563; relating to restoring truth and sanity to American history) shall have the force and effect of law.
